review:
this movie is one of my favourites of all time!!
rajpal yadav is one of my favourite actors.
he has done many of my favourites like de dana dan, kushti, bhool bhulaiya, etc.
he is one of the actors who has made legends in comedy actor world!!
respect to sir rajpal yadav.
